description: Learn how to make a plant-based version of scrambled eggs with this vegan tofu scramble recipe. Ready in just 10 minutes, it's perfect for a quick breakfast.
name: Tofu Scramble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tofu in a large bowl. Using back of a fork, smash tofu until it resembles scrambled eggs.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add tofu, milk and turmeric, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until milk has thickened slightly. Season well. Serve over sourdough and scattered with chives.
